```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(arrow)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
df <- read_parquet("data/processed/valve_combined.parquet")

df <- df %>%
  filter(timestamp > "2025-01-01")
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(timestamp, voltage)) +
  geom_line()
```

```{r}
c <- df |> 
  ggplot(aes(timestamp, current)) +
  geom_line()
  
ggplotly(c)
```
